text: Remus Ludu (13 May 1914 - 1982) was a Romanian gymnast. He competed in eight events at the 1936 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1914 births Category:1982 deaths Category:Romanian male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of Romania Category:Gymnasts at the 1936 Summer Olympics Category:People from Târgu Lăpuș
title: Remus Ludu
